page.title: 20CONCLUSION 03800597
page.content: Generally speaking the inhabitants of the area are a{contented}lot.Newcomers are struck by the friendship and welcome they receive, and settle in quickly.There is virtually no unemploy ment.There is some disquiet about the volume and speed of{traffic}passing through the village and disappointment at the shelving of plans for a bypass and refusal of a speed limit for the village.The{building}of council bungalows for retirement would be desirable thus freeing some{housing for young people and generally allowing those who wish to stay in the area to do so.Some complain ofthe high cost of travel and high prices charged by{travelling}shops.Advantages include a regular bus service to town, yet a pleasant rural environment with all the freedoms and activities of village life.
